tgt_original: 時虛空中有諸天見。 善哉大士。 真大悲者。

tgt_original: 不久當證清淨涅槃。

src_original: atha khalu sā vyāghrī rudhiramrakṣitaśarīraṃ bodhisattvamavekṣya muhūrtamātreṇa nirmāṃsarudhiramasthyavaśeṣaṃ cakāra //
tgt_original: 是虎見血流污王身。 即便舐血噉食其肉唯留餘骨。

src_original: atha mahāpraṇādastaṃ bhūmikampamanuniśamya mahādevametadavocat //  pracalita sasamudrā sāgarā vasumatidaśadikṣū suptaraśmiśca sūryaḥ /  patati kusumavarṣaṃ vyākulaṃ vā mano me svatanuriha visṛṣṭaḥ sāṃprataṃ bhrātṛṇā me // Suv_19.11//  mahādeva uvāca /
tgt_original: 爾時兩兄見地大動日無精光雨諸華香。

src_original: yathā ca so karuṇavaco hyavocata samīkṣya tāṃ svatanāyabhakṣaṇodyatāṃ /  kṣudhānvitāṃ vyaśanaśataiḥ samanvitāṃ sudurbalā matiriha saṃśayā tu me // Suv_19.12 //
tgt_original: 必是我弟捨所愛身。

src_original: atha tau rājakumārau paramaśokābhibhūtau vāṣpapariplutākṣau tamenaṃ panthānaṃ pratinivṛtya gacchantau vyāghrīsamīpamevābhijagmatuḥ /
tgt_original: 時二王子心大愁悑。 洟泣悲歎容貌樵瘁。 復共相將還至虎所。

src_original: taṃ dadṛśtuḥ śataṃ vaṃśalatāsamāyuktaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇavikṛṣṇāni (Bagchi 111)
tgt_original: 見弟所著衣裳。 皆悉在一竹枝之上。 骸骨髮爪布散狼籍。

src_original: cāsthīni rudhirakardamāni /  nānādigvidikṣu keśānvistīrṇāndṛṣṭvā ca samūrcchannau bhūmau nipetatuḥ /
tgt_original: 流血處處遍污其地。 見已悶絕不自勝持。

src_original: sacirātsaṃjñāmupalabhyotthāyocceyabāhū ārtasvaraṃ mumucatuḥ /
tgt_original: 投身骨上良久乃寤。 即起舉手呼天而哭。

src_original: aho priyabhrātṛka pārthivāyaṃ tathā jananī sutavatsalā yā
tgt_original: 我弟幼稚才能過人。 父母所愛奄忽捨身。

src_original: aho hi asmākamihaiva śobhitaṃ nanū pradeśe maraṇaṃ na jīvitam /
tgt_original: 我寧在此併命一處。

src_original: kathaṃ mahāsattvavivarjitā vayaṃ dāsyāmahe darśanamambatātayoḥ // Suv_19.14 //
tgt_original: 不忍還見父母眷屬。

src_original: atha tau rājakumārau bahuvividhakaruṇaṃ vilāpya pracakramatuḥ /  tatra kumārasyopasthāyakā diśi vidiśi pradhāvantaḥ kumārānveṣaṇāḥ parasparaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca papracchuḥ kva kumāraḥ kva kumāra iti /
tgt_original: 時小王子所將侍從。 各散諸方互相謂言。 今者我天為何所在。

src_original: tasmiṃśca samaye devī śayanatalagatā priyaviprayogasūcakaṃ svapnaṃ dadarśa /
tgt_original: 爾時王妃於睡眠中。

src_original: tadyathā stanau chidyamānau dantotpātanaṃ ca kriyamāṇaṃ trayaḥ kapotaśāvakāḥ pratilambhamānāste bhītā eva śyenenācchidyamānāḥ /
tgt_original: 夢乳被割牙齒墮落。

src_original: bahūni kalpāni mayātmā tyaktaḥ paryeṣayetā imamagrabodhim /  yathāsi rājā yatha rājaputram tathaiva tyaktā maya ātmabhāvāḥ // Suv_19.23 //
tgt_original: 我於往昔　　無量劫中　　捨所重身 以求菩提　　若為國王　　及作王子 常捨難捨　　以求菩提　　我念宿命

src_original: anusmarami purimāsu jātiṣu mahāratho nāma babhūva rājā /
tgt_original: 有大國王　　其王名曰　　摩訶羅陀

src_original: tasyāpi putrau mahātyāgavanto nāmnā mahāsattva varo babhūva // Suv_19.24 //
tgt_original: 是王有子　　能大布施　　其子名曰 摩訶薩埵　　復有二兄　　長者名曰

src_original: dvau tasya āsīdatha bhrātarau ca nāmnā mahādeva mahāpraṇādaḥ /
tgt_original: 大波那羅　　次名大天　　三人同遊

src_original: vanakhaṇḍa gatvā va samānagotraistairdṛṣṭa vyāghrī kṣudhayābhibhūtā // Suv_19.25 //
tgt_original: 至一空山　　見新產虎　　飢窮無食

src_original: tasyāgrasattvasya kṛpābhijātā yannūna haṃ ātma tyajeya māṃsam /  (Bagchi 115)
tgt_original: 時勝大王　　生大悲心　　我今當捨

src_original: eṣā hi vyāghrī kṣudhatarṣapīḍitā khādīya etāni svakātmajāni // Suv_19.26 //
tgt_original: 所重之身　　此虎或為　　飢餓所逼

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca vyāghrīṃ kṣudhārtāṃ vyāghrasutamokṣārtham // Suv_19.27 //
tgt_original: 自投虎前　　為令虎子　　得全性命

src_original: karuṇāmaye patite 'tra kampita saśaila dharaṇī vidruta pakṣisaṃgha vividhāni /
tgt_original: 是時大地　　及諸大山　　皆悉震動

src_original: saṃtrasto mṛgasaṃghastadākulasaṃsthito 'bhūlloko 'yam // Suv_19.28 //
tgt_original: 驚諸蟲獸　　虎狼師子　　四散馳走

src_original: dvau tasya bhrātarau ca mahāpraṇādastathā mahādevaḥ /
tgt_original: 世間皆暗　　無有光明　　是時二兄

src_original: na labhete mahāsattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mahāvanakhaṇḍe 'smin // Suv_19.29 //  atiśokaśalyahṛdayā vicaranti vanāntare visaṃjñāśca /  paryeṣanti bhrātaramaścumukhāni vicaranti vanamadhye // Suv_19.30 //  ubhau tau rājakumārau mahāpraṇādastathā mahādevaḥ /
tgt_original: 故在竹林　　心懷憂惱　　愁苦涕泣

src_original: tatropasaṃkramitva yatra vyāghrī sudurbalā śayitā vyāghrīsutā // Suv_19.31 //  dṛṣṭvā rudhiraliptāṅgāni keśāsthicarmamātraṃ dharaṇyām /
tgt_original: 漸漸推求　　遂至虎所　　見虎虎子 血污其口　　又見骸骨　　髮毛爪齒

src_original: avakīrṇa patitāni yatkiñcinmātraṃ tasya patitaṃ dharaṇīyaṃ paśyanti // Suv_19.32 //  ubhau tau nṛpasutau saṃmūrcchitau hi tatra patanti dharaṇīyam /
tgt_original: 處處迸血　　狼藉在地　　是二王子 見是事已　　心更悶絕　　自躄於地

src_original: naṣṭamanāḥ sarvapāṇḍu rajoliptagātrāḥ smṛtīndriyavihīnamūḍhacittāśca // Suv_19.33 //

src_original: teṣāṃ co pārṣadyāḥ karuṇasvararodamānaśokārttāḥ /

src_original: siñcanti te jalenotthitordhvabahavaśca kradantaḥ // Suv_19.34 //
tgt_original: 亦生悲慟　　先聲號哭　　互以冷水

src_original: tasminpatitamātreṇa sāntarjane vipriyāgramahiṣī ca /  paśyati pañcastrīśatebhī rājakulāntargatā sukhapraviṣṭakāyā // Suv_19.35 //
tgt_original: 共相噴灑　　然後蘇息　　而復得起 是時王子　　當捨身時　　正值後宮 妃后婇女　　眷屬五百　　共相娛樂

src_original: tābhyāṃ stanābhyāṃ kṣīrapramuktaṃ prastravantya vegaiḥ /

tgt_original: 痛如針刺　　心生愁惱　　似喪愛子

src_original: upasaṃkramitva nṛpatiṃ sudīnamanasā atiśokasaṃtaptā /

src_original: karuṇasvaraṃ rodamāna rājño 'tha mahārathasyaivāvocat // Suv_19.37 //

src_original: ubhābhyāṃ stanamukhābhyāṃ kṣīrapramuktamacireṇa // Suv_19.38 //  sūcībhirivāṅgamaṅgaṃ pīḍyanti sma tāni mama hṛdayaṃ ca /

tgt_original: 即生憂惱　　我今愁怖　　恐命不濟

src_original: putrāṇa me vijāna dadasva mama jīvitaṃ bhavānsvakāruṇyam // Suv_19.42 //
tgt_original: 願速遣人　　推求我子　　是時王妃

src_original: evamuktvāgramahiṣī saṃmūrcchati patati tatra dharaṇīye  smṛtīya parihīnā vinaṣṭacittā visaṃjñamanā /  sarvāntaḥpuraṇāśca karuṇasvaraṃ rodamānāḥ krandantaḥ // Suv_19.43 //
tgt_original: 說是語已　　即時悶絕　　而復躄地

src_original: kumārāṇāṃ mā tvamatidīnamānasā bhavā hīnāyāsa śokahṛdayā /  evaṃ mahārathaśca kṣamāpayitvā tadāgramahiṣīṃ ca kampo niṣkrame // Suv_19.50 //
tgt_original: 莫大憂愁　　大王如是　　慰喻妃已 即便嚴駕　　出其宮殿　　心生愁惱

tgt_original: 憂苦所切　　雖在大眾　　顏貌憔悴 即出其城　　覓所愛子　　爾時亦有

tgt_original: 無量諸人　　哀號動地　　尋從王後

src_original: rājā sa mahārathaḥ samanantarātpriyaputradarśanārthaṃ prekṣati /
tgt_original: 求覓其子　　煩惋心亂　　靡知所在

tgt_original: 最後遙見　　有一信來　　頭蒙塵土

src_original: rudhirāliptāṅga pāṃśulaśarīraṃ aśrumukhaṃ rodamānaṃ gacchantam /
tgt_original: 血污其衣　　灰糞塗身　　悲號而至

src_original: dāruṇaśokārttaḥ mahārathasya hṛdayastho 'śrumukho rodamānaḥ // Suv_19.54 //  sthita ūrdhvabāhuśca krandantaḥ athānyatamo 'mātyastvarāgatya /  śīghrabhārādupasaṃkramya nṛpate rājño mahārathasya āvaciṃsu // Suv_19.55 //
tgt_original: 爾時大王　　摩訶羅陀　　見是使已 倍生懊惱　　舉首號叫　　仰天而哭 先所遣臣　　尋復來至　　既至王所

src_original: mā śokacittastvaṃ bhava nṛpate tiṣṭhanti te putrāḥ priyamanāpāḥ /
tgt_original: 作如是言　　願王莫愁　　諸子猶在

src_original: na cireṇāgamya iha tavāntike drakṣyasi tvaṃ putravaraṃ manāpam // Suv_19.56 //
tgt_original: 不久當至　　令王得見　　須臾之頃

src_original: muhūrtamātramabhigamya - - rājño dvitīyo 'mātya āgatastataḥ /
tgt_original: 復有臣來　　見王愁苦　　顏貌憔悴

src_original: rajo 'vakīrṇo malavastraprāvṛtaḥ sāśrumukho rājānamidamabravīd // Suv_19.57 //
tgt_original: 身所著衣　　垢膩塵污　　大王當知

src_original: dvai ca te putrai mahānṛpendra tiṣṭhataḥ śokānalasaṃpradīptau /
tgt_original: 一子已終　　二子雖在　　哀悴無賴

src_original: (Bagchi 120)  dṛṣṭvā ca vyāghrīmaciraprasutāṃ svīyāñca putrānupabhoktukāmām /  teṣāṃ mahāsattva varakumāro mahānta kāruṇya balaṃ janetvā // Suv_19.59 //
tgt_original: 恐還食子　　見是虎已　　生大悲心

tgt_original: 發大誓願　　當度眾生　　於未來世 證成菩提　　即上高處　　投身虎前

src_original: patito mahāsattvo giri taṭatu so 'gre sthito vyāghryaḥ kṣudhābhibhūtāyāḥ /
tgt_original: 虎飢所逼　　便起啗食　　一切血肉

src_original: muhūrta nirmāsakṛtaḥ sa aṅgaṃ ca asthāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtaḥ rājaputraḥ // Suv_19.61 //
tgt_original: 已為都盡　　唯有骸骨　　狼藉在地

src_original: evaṃ ca śrutvā sa vacaḥ sudhāreṃ saṃmūrcchito rāja mahārathaśca /

src_original: patitaśca dharaṇīya vinaṣṭacittaḥ śokāgninā prajvalitaḥ sudāruṇā // Suv_19.62 //
tgt_original: 失念躄地　　憂愁盛火　　熾然其身

src_original: āmātyapārṣadya karuṇāsvararodamānā śokārta siñcantite jalena /

src_original: sarve sthitā ūrdhvabāhuśca sa kandamānāḥ tṛtīyo 'mātyo nṛpamabravīt // Suv_19.63 //
tgt_original: 良久乃穌　　復起舉首　　號天而哭 復有臣來　　而白王言　　向於林中

src_original: dṛṣṭau mayādya ubhau kumārau samucchatau tatra mahāvane 'smin /
tgt_original: 見二王子　　愁憂苦毒　　悲號涕泣

src_original: patitau dharaṇyāṃ ca vinaṣṭacittau asmābhirudakena ca siñcitāni // Suv_19.64 //
tgt_original: 迷悶失志　　自投於地　　臣即求水 灑其身上　　良久之頃　　乃還穌息

src_original: yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate punaḥ sthitau hi ādīpta paśyanti diśaścatastraḥ /
tgt_original: 望見四方　　大火熾然　　扶持暫起

src_original: muhūrta tiṣṭhanti patanti bhūmau kāruṇasvareṇa paridevayanti // Suv_19.65 //
tgt_original: 尋復躄地　　舉首悲哀　　號天而哭

src_original: tā ūrdhvabāhu satataṃ sthihanti varṇamudīrantayorbhrātarasya
tgt_original: 乍復讚歎　　其弟功德　　是時大王

src_original: sa caiva rājā hṛdi dīnacittaḥ putraviyogātsuvikṣiptacittaḥ // Suv_19.66 //

src_original: śokapraviddhaḥ paridevayitvā evaṃ hi rājā paridevayanti /
tgt_original: 憂惱涕泣　　並復思惟　　是最小子

src_original: ekaśca me putra priyamanāpaḥ grasta kaniṣṭho vanarākṣasena // Suv_19.67 //
tgt_original: 我所愛重　　無常大鬼　　奄便吞食

src_original: mā me imau anya ca dvau hi putra śokāgninā jīvitasaṃkṣayaṃ vrajet /

src_original: yannūna haṃ śīghra vrajeya tatra paśyeya putrau priyadarśanau tau // Suv_19.68 //
tgt_original: 我宜速往　　至彼林中　　迎載諸子

src_original: teṣāṃ mahāsattva varakumāro mahānta kāruṇya balaṃ janetvā // Suv_19.59 //  bodhau ca kṛtvā praṇidhimudārāṃ sarvāṃśca sattvāniha bodhayiṣye /
tgt_original: 深生悲心　　發大誓願　　當度眾生

src_original: taṃ bodhiṃ gambhīramudāramiṣṭvā anāgate 'dhvani ahaṃ spṛśeyam // Suv_19.60 //
tgt_original: 於未來世　　證成菩提　　即上高處

src_original: patito mahāsattvo giri taṭatu so 'gre sthito vyāghryaḥ kṣudhābhibhūtāyāḥ /
tgt_original: 投身餓虎　　虎飢所逼　　便起噉食

src_original: muhūrta nirmāsakṛtaḥ sa aṅgaṃ ca asthāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtaḥ rājaputraḥ // Suv_19.61 //
tgt_original: 一切血肉　　已為都盡　　唯有骸骨

src_original: āmātyapārṣadya karuṇāsvararodamānā śokārta siñcantite jalena /
tgt_original: 熾然其身　　諸臣眷屬　　亦復如是 以水灑王　　良久乃蘇　　復起舉手

src_original: patitaśca dharaṇīya vinaṣṭacittaḥ śokāgninā prajvalitaḥ sudāruṇā // Suv_19.62 //
tgt_original: 轉復悶絕　　失念躄地　　憂愁盛火

src_original: sarve sthitā ūrdhvabāhuśca sa kandamānāḥ tṛtīyo 'mātyo nṛpamabravīt // Suv_19.63 //
tgt_original: 號天而哭　　復有臣來　　而白王言

src_original: dṛṣṭau mayādya ubhau kumārau samucchatau tatra mahāvane 'smin /
tgt_original: 向於林中　　見二王子　　愁憂苦毒

src_original: patitau dharaṇyāṃ ca vinaṣṭacittau asmābhirudakena ca siñcitāni // Suv_19.64 //
tgt_original: 悲號啼哭　　迷悶失志　　自投於地

src_original: yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate punaḥ sthitau hi ādīpta paśyanti diśaścatastraḥ /  muhūrta tiṣṭhanti patanti bhūmau kāruṇasvareṇa paridevayanti // Suv_19.65 //  tā ūrdhvabāhu satataṃ sthihanti varṇamudīrantayorbhrātarasya  sa caiva rājā hṛdi dīnacittaḥ putraviyogātsuvikṣiptacittaḥ // Suv_19.66 //  śokapraviddhaḥ paridevayitvā evaṃ hi rājā paridevayanti /
tgt_original: 臣即求水　　灑其身上　　是最小子

src_original: ekaśca me putra priyamanāpaḥ grasta kaniṣṭho vanarākṣasena // Suv_19.67 //
tgt_original: 我所愛重　　無常大鬼　　奄便吞食

src_original: mā me imau anya ca dvau hi putra śokāgninā jīvitasaṃkṣayaṃ vrajet /
tgt_original: 其餘二子　　今雖存在　　而為憂火 之所焚燒　　或能為是　　喪失命根

src_original: yannūna haṃ śīghra vrajeya tatra paśyeya putrau priyadarśanau tau // Suv_19.68 //
tgt_original: 我宜速往　　至彼林中　　迎載諸子

src_original: śīghreṇa yānena ca rājadhānīṃ praveśayedrājakulānta śīghram /  mā eṣā māturhi janetu kāmaṃ śokāgninā taddhṛdaya sphaṭe tat // Suv_19.69 //
tgt_original: 急還宮殿　　其母在後　　憂苦逼切

src_original: putrau ca dṛṣṭvā labhate praśāntiṃ na jīvitenālabhate viyogam /  rājāpi cāmātyagaṇena sārdhaṃ dvipābhirūḍho gata tatra darśitu // Suv_19.70 //
tgt_original: 與諸侍從　　欲至彼林　　即於中路

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca putrau bhrātṛnāmāhvānau karuṇāsvaraṃ krandatau āttamānā /
tgt_original: 見其二子　　號天扣地　　稱弟名字

src_original: rājā hi tatputradvayaṃ gṛhītvā prarodamānopi puraṃ vrajitvā /
tgt_original: 時王即前　　抱持二子　　悲號洟泣

src_original: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro yena svapitā jaṭiṃdharaḥ śreṣṭhī tenopajagāma /
tgt_original: 時長者子即至父所。

src_original: upetya svapiturjaṭiṃdharasya pādau śirasā vanditvā kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvaikānte 'sthāt /  ekānte sthito jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputraḥ svapitaraṃ jaṭiṃdharaṃ śreṣṭhinamimābhirgāthābhirdhātukauśalyaṃ pṛcchati sma //
tgt_original: 說偈問言。

src_original: tānīndriyāṇi lakṣante parivartanti dhātavaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何當知　　四大諸根　　衰損伐謝

src_original: kena kālena jāyante vyādhayaśca śarīriṇām // Suv_17.1 //
tgt_original: 而得諸病　　云何當知　　飲食時節

src_original: bhojanaṃ ca kathaṃ bhuktvā kāle kāle sukhāvaham /  yenāntaraśarīrasya kāyo 'gninopahanyate // Suv_17.2 //
tgt_original: 若食食已　　身火不滅　　云何當知

src_original: kathaṃ cikitsā kartavyā vāte pitte śleṣmike tathā /
tgt_original: 治風及熱　　水過肺病　　及以等分

src_original: saṃnipāte samutpanne kathaṃ vyādhiśāntaye // Suv_17.3 //  kiṃ kāle kupyate vātaḥ pittaṃ kupyate kadā /  kiṃ kāle kupyate śleṣmā yena pīḍyanti mānavāḥ // Suv_17.4 //
tgt_original: 何時動風　　何時動熱　　何時動水

src_original: atha khalu jaṭiṃdharaḥ śreṣṭhī jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhiputrasyābhirgāthābhirdhātukauśalyaṃ viditvā deśayate sma //
tgt_original: 以害眾生　　時父長者　　即以偈頌 解說醫方　　而答其子　　三月是夏

src_original: varṣā cātra trayo māsāstrayaśca śāradaṃ smṛtam /  trayastathaiva hemāntastrayaśca grīṣmikastathā // Suv_17.5 //
tgt_original: 三月是秋　　三月是冬　　三月是春 是十二月　　三三而說　　從如是數

src_original: annaṃ ca pānaṃ ca tathā ca jīryate vaidyāśca kauśalyasmṛtipradarśitāḥ // Suv_17.6 //
tgt_original: 消息飲食　　是能益身　　醫方所說

src_original: te cāpi saṃvatsaraparvamantare parivartantīndriyadhātavo 'pi /
tgt_original: 隨時歲中　　諸根四大　　代謝增損

src_original: parivartamānāni ca indriyāṇi vicitravyādhirbhavate śarīriṇām // Suv_17.7 //
tgt_original: 令身得病　　有善醫師　　隨順四時

src_original: tatraiva vaidyasya catuḥ prakāraṃ trimāsaparvāntare ṣaḍṛtūni /  ṣaḍdhātukauśalyaprajānitavyaṃ yathākramaṃ bhojanamauṣadhaṃ ca // Suv_17.8 //
tgt_original: 三月將養　　調和六大　　隨病飲食 及以湯藥　　多風病者　　夏則發動

src_original: vātādhikārāḥ prabhavanti varṣe pattiprakopaḥ śaradi prasanne /  hemantakāle tatha saṃnipātaṃ kaphādhikārāśca bhavanti grīṣme // Suv_17.9 //
tgt_original: 其熱病者　　秋則發動　　等分病者 冬則發動　　其肺病者　　春則增劇

src_original: snigdhoṣṇalavaṇāmlarasāśca varṣe śaratsu snigdhaṃ madhuraṃ ca śītam /  madhurāmlasnigdhaṃ ca hemantakāle rūkṣoṣṇakaṭukāni ca grīṣmakāle // Suv_17.10 //
tgt_original: 有風病者　　夏則應服　　肥膩醎酢
